sentences.en: Demerits were given to students for late attendance at prayers.
sentences.cn: 祷告会上迟到的学生被记过了。

sentences.en: However, a most important feature of our browser covers the demerit of the speed performance.
sentences.cn: 但是, 最重要的特征包括浏览速度表现差劲.(包括?意思全反了. )

sentences.en: If this matter was known by the teachers in school, I would possibly get a demerit.
sentences.cn: 这件事万一被学校老师知道了, 说不定会被记过!

sentences.en: The paper analyzes the demerit of conventional reliability evaluation method of function substitute model ( FSM ).
sentences.cn: 针对功能替代模型的定义,分析了原有的可靠性评估方法存在的不足.

sentences.en: TV has its merit and demerit.
What do you think about your merit and demerit? Can you give some example?
sentences.cn: 你认为你有哪些优点、缺点? 能不能各举一些例子说明 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: a bad quality or feature of something
